name: src/PluginEntry.js
PluginEntry
description: Defines a class holding the data associated with a plugin including it's instance.

name: enabled
description: Get enabled.

name: name
description: Get name.

name: type
description: Get plugin type.

name: instance
description: Get plugin instance.

name: eventProxy
description: Get associated EventProxy.

name: options
description: Get plugin options.

name: enabled
description: Set enabled.

name: _enabled
description: The plugin enabled state.

name: constructor
description: Instantiates a PluginEntry.

params.name: eventProxy
params.description: An EventProxy associated with the plugin wrapping the plugin manager eventbus.
params.descriptionRaw: An EventProxy associated with the plugin wrapping the plugin manager eventbus.

name: _name
description: The plugin name.

name: _type
description: The plugin type: require or instance.

name: _instance
description: The loaded plugin instance.

name: _eventProxy
description: An EventProxy associated with the plugin wrapping the plugin manager eventbus.
descriptionRaw: An EventProxy associated with the plugin wrapping the plugin manager eventbus.

name: _options
description: Optional plugin options.

name: src/PluginEvent.js
PluginEvent
description:
PluginEvent - Provides the data / event passed to all invoked methods in {@link PluginManager#invokeSyncEvent}. The
`event.data` field is returned to the caller. Before returning though additional the following additional metadata
is attached:

(number)          `$$plugin_invoke_count` - The count of plugins invoked.

(Array<string>)   `$$plugin_invoke_names` - The names of plugins invoked.

name: constructor
description: Initializes PluginEvent.

name: data
description: Provides the unified event data assigning any pass through data to the copied data supplied.

name: eventbus
description: Unique data available in each plugin invoked.

name: pluginName
description: Unique data available in each plugin invoked.

name: pluginOptions
description: Unique data available in each plugin invoked.

name: src/PluginManager.js
PluginManager
constructor
description: Instantiates PluginManager

params.name: options.eventbus
params.description: An instance of 'backbone-esnext-events' used as the plugin eventbus.
params.descriptionRaw: An instance of 'backbone-esnext-events' used as the plugin eventbus.

params.name: options.eventPrepend
params.description: A customized name to prepend PluginManager events on the eventbus.
params.descriptionRaw:
A customized name to prepend PluginManager events on the
                                                    eventbus.

params.name: options.throwNoMethod
params.description: If true then when a method fails to be invoked by any plugin an exception will be thrown.
params.descriptionRaw:
If true then when a method fails to be invoked by any plugin
                                                  an exception will be thrown.

params.name: options.throwNoPlugin
params.description: If true then when no plugin is matched to be invoked an exception will be thrown.
params.descriptionRaw:
If true then when no plugin is matched to be invoked an
                                                  exception will be thrown.

name: _pluginMap
description: Stores the plugins by name with an associated PluginEntry.
descriptionRaw: Stores the plugins by name with an associated PluginEntry.

name: _eventbus
description: Stores any associated eventbus.

name: _options
description: Defines options for throwing exceptions. Turned off by default.
descriptionRaw: Defines options for throwing exceptions. Turned off by default.

name: add
description:
Adds a plugin by the given configuration parameters. A plugin `name` is always required. If no other options
are provided then the `name` doubles as the NPM module / local file to load. The loading first checks for an
existing `instance` to use as the plugin. Then the `target` is chosen as the NPM module / local file to load.
By passing in `options` this will be stored and accessible to the plugin during all callbacks.

name: addAll
description: Initializes multiple plugins in a single call.

params.name: pluginConfigs
params.description: An array of plugin config object hash entries.
params.descriptionRaw: An array of plugin config object hash entries.

name: _addEventbus
description: Provides the eventbus callback which may prevent addition if optional noEventAdd is enabled. This disables the ability for plugins to be added via events preventing any external code adding plugins in this manner.
descriptionRaw:
Provides the eventbus callback which may prevent addition if optional `noEventAdd` is enabled. This disables
the ability for plugins to be added via events preventing any external code adding plugins in this manner.

name: _addAllEventbus
description: Provides the eventbus callback which may prevent addition if optional noEventAdd is enabled. This disables the ability for plugins to be added via events preventing any external code adding plugins in this manner.
descriptionRaw:
Provides the eventbus callback which may prevent addition if optional `noEventAdd` is enabled. This disables
the ability for plugins to be added via events preventing any external code adding plugins in this manner.

name: destroy
description: Destroys all managed plugins after unloading them.

name: enableAllPlugins
description: Enables or disables all plugins.

name: enablePlugin
description: Enables or disables a single plugin.

name: enablePlugins
description: Enables or disables a set of plugins given an array or iterabe of plugin names.

params.name: pluginNames
params.descriptionRaw: An array / iterable of plugin names.

name: getEventbus
description: Returns any associated eventbus.

name: getMethodNames
description:
Returns all method names or if a boolean is passed in will return method names for plugins by current enabled
state.

params.name: enabled
params.description: If enabled is a boolean it will return plugin methods names given their enabled state.
params.descriptionRaw:
If enabled is a boolean it will return plugin methods names given their
                                     enabled state.

params.name: pluginName
params.description: If a string then just this plugins methods names are returned.
params.descriptionRaw: If a string then just this plugins methods names are returned.

name: getOptions
description: Returns a copy of the plugin manager options.

name: getPluginMethodNames
description: Returns all plugin names or if a boolean is passed in will return plugin names by current enabled state.

params.name: enabled
params.description: If enabled is a boolean it will return plugins given their enabled state.
params.descriptionRaw: If enabled is a boolean it will return plugins given their enabled state.

name: getPluginNames
description: Returns all plugin names or if a boolean is passed in will return plugin names by current enabled state.

params.name: enabled
params.description: If enabled is a boolean it will return plugins given their enabled state.
params.descriptionRaw: If enabled is a boolean it will return plugins given their enabled state.

name: getPluginOptions
description: Returns a copy of the given plugin options.

name: hasMethod
description: Returns true if there is at least one plugin loaded with the given method name.

name: hasPlugin
description: Returns true if there is a plugin loaded with the given plugin name.

name: hasPluginMethod
description:
Returns true if there is a plugin loaded with the given plugin name that also has a method with the given
method name.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} - True if a plugin and method exists.

return.description: True if a plugin and method exists.
return.descriptionRaw: True if a plugin and method exists.

name: invokeAsync
description:
This dispatch method uses ES6 Promises and adds any returned results to an array which is added to a Promise.all
construction which passes back a Promise which waits until all Promises complete. Any target invoked may return a
Promise or any result. This is very useful to use for any asynchronous operations.

params.name: nameOrList
params.description: An optional plugin name or array / iterable of plugin names to invoke.
params.descriptionRaw:
An optional plugin name or array / iterable of plugin names to
                                           invoke.

name: invokeSync
description:
This dispatch method synchronously passes back a single value or an array with all results returned by any
invoked targets.

params.name: nameOrList
params.description: An optional plugin name or array / iterable of plugin names to invoke.
params.descriptionRaw:
An optional plugin name or array / iterable of plugin names to
                                            invoke.

name: invokeSyncEvent
description: This dispatch method synchronously passes to and returns from any invoked targets a PluginEvent.

params.name: passthruProps
params.descriptionRaw: if true, event has plugin option.

params.name: nameOrList
params.description: An optional plugin name or array / iterable of plugin names to invoke.
params.descriptionRaw:
An optional plugin name or array / iterable of plugin names to
                                            invoke.

name: setEventbus
description:
Sets the eventbus associated with this plugin manager. If any previous eventbus was associated all plugin manager
events will be removed then added to the new eventbus. If there are any existing plugins being managed their
events will be removed from the old eventbus and then `onPluginLoad` will be called with the new eventbus.

params.name: eventPrepend
params.description: An optional string to prepend to all of the event binding targets.
params.descriptionRaw:
An optional string to prepend to all of the event binding
                                                   targets.

name: _eventPrepend
description: Stores the prepend string for eventbus registration.
descriptionRaw: Stores the prepend string for eventbus registration.

name: setOptions
description: Set optional parameters. All parameters are off by default.

name: remove
description: Removes a plugin by name after unloading it and clearing any event bindings automatically.

name: removeAll
description: Removes all plugins after unloading them and clearing any event bindings automatically.

name: _removeEventbus
description: Provides the eventbus callback which may prevent removal if optional noEventRemoval is enabled. This disables the ability for plugins to be removed via events preventing any external code removing plugins in this manner.
descriptionRaw:
Provides the eventbus callback which may prevent removal if optional `noEventRemoval` is enabled. This disables
the ability for plugins to be removed via events preventing any external code removing plugins in this manner.

name: _removeAllEventbus
description: Provides the eventbus callback which may prevent removal if optional noEventRemoval is enabled. This disables the ability for plugins to be removed via events preventing any external code removing plugins in this manner.
descriptionRaw:
Provides the eventbus callback which may prevent removal if optional `noEventRemoval` is enabled. This disables
the ability for plugins to be removed via events preventing any external code removing plugins in this manner.

name: s_INVOKE_SYNC_EVENTS
description:
Private implementation to invoke synchronous events. This allows internal calls in PluginManager for
`onPluginLoad` and `onPluginUnload` callbacks to bypass optional error checking.

This dispatch method synchronously passes to and returns from any invoked targets a PluginEvent.

params.name: passthruProps
params.description: if true, event has plugin option.

params.name: nameOrList
params.description:
An optional plugin name or array / iterable of plugin names to
                                                 invoke.

params.name: pluginMap
params.description: Stores the plugins by name with an associated PluginEntry.

params.name: options
params.description: Defines options for throwing exceptions. Turned off by default.

params.name: performErrorCheck
params.description: If false optional error checking is disabled.

name: s_GET_ALL_PROPERTY_NAMES
description: Walks an objects inheritance tree collecting property names stopping before `Object` is reached.

name: src/types/types.js
content:
/**
 * @typedef {object} PluginConfig
 *
 * @property {string}   name - Defines the name of the plugin; if no `target` entry is present the name
 *                             doubles as the target (please see target).
 *
 * @property {string}   [target] - Defines the target NPM module to load or defines a local file (full
 *                                 path or relative to current working directory to load.
 *
 * @property {string}   [instance] - Defines an existing object instance to use as the plugin.
 *
 * @property {object}   [options] - Defines an object of options for the plugin.
 */

/**
 * @typedef {object} ManagerOptions
 *
 * @property {boolean}   [noEventAdd] - If true this prevents plugins from being added by `plugin:add` and
 *                                      `plugin:add:all` events forcing direct method invocation for addition.
 *
 * @property {boolean}   [noEventRemoval] - If true this prevents plugins from being removed by `plugin:remove` and
 *                                          `plugin:remove:all` events forcing direct method invocation for removal.
 *
 * @property {boolean}   [throwNoMethod] - If true then when a method fails to be invoked by any plugin an exception
 *                                         will be thrown.
 *
 * @property {boolean}   [throwNoPlugin] - If true then when no plugin is matched to be invoked an exception will be
 *                                         thrown.
 */

/**
 * @external {EventProxy} https://docs.typhonjs.io/typhonjs-backbone-esnext/backbone-esnext-events/class/src/EventProxy.js~EventProxy.html
 */

/**
 * @external {TyphonEvents} https://docs.typhonjs.io/typhonjs-backbone-esnext/backbone-esnext-events/class/src/TyphonEvents.js~TyphonEvents.html
 */

properties.name: name
properties.description: Defines the name of the plugin; if no target entry is present the name doubles as the target (please see target).
properties.descriptionRaw:
Defines the name of the plugin; if no `target` entry is present the name
                            doubles as the target (please see target).

properties.name: target
properties.description: Defines the target NPM module to load or defines a local file (full path or relative to current working directory to load.
properties.descriptionRaw:
Defines the target NPM module to load or defines a local file (full
                                path or relative to current working directory to load.

properties.name: instance
properties.description: Defines an existing object instance to use as the plugin.
properties.descriptionRaw: Defines an existing object instance to use as the plugin.

properties.name: options
properties.description: Defines an object of options for the plugin.
properties.descriptionRaw: Defines an object of options for the plugin.

properties.name: noEventAdd
properties.description: If true this prevents plugins from being added by plugin:add and plugin:add:all events forcing direct method invocation for addition.
properties.descriptionRaw:
If true this prevents plugins from being added by `plugin:add` and
                                     `plugin:add:all` events forcing direct method invocation for addition.

properties.name: noEventRemoval
properties.description: If true this prevents plugins from being removed by plugin:remove and plugin:remove:all events forcing direct method invocation for removal.
properties.descriptionRaw:
If true this prevents plugins from being removed by `plugin:remove` and
                                         `plugin:remove:all` events forcing direct method invocation for removal.

properties.name: throwNoMethod
properties.description: If true then when a method fails to be invoked by any plugin an exception will be thrown.
properties.descriptionRaw:
If true then when a method fails to be invoked by any plugin an exception
                                        will be thrown.

properties.name: throwNoPlugin
properties.description: If true then when no plugin is matched to be invoked an exception will be thrown.
properties.descriptionRaw:
If true then when no plugin is matched to be invoked an exception will be
                                        thrown.
